briefTitle: Ketamine as a Treatment for Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinician-Administered PTSD Scale for DSM-5 (CAPS-5)
outcomeMeasures.description: full range score from 0-80, with higher scores indicating greater PTSD symptoms

outcomeMeasures.title: The Impact of Event Scale - Revised (IES-R)
outcomeMeasures.description: full range score from 0-88, with higher scores indicating greater PTSD symptoms

outcomeMeasures.title: Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS)
outcomeMeasures.description: full range score from 0-60, with higher scores indicating greater depressive symptoms

outcomeMeasures.title: Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS)
outcomeMeasures.description: full range score from 0-60, with higher scores indicating greater depressive symptoms

outcomeMeasures.title: Quick Inventory of Depression Symptomatology - Self-Report (QIDS-SR)
outcomeMeasures.description: full range score from 0-27, with higher scores indicating greater depressive symptoms

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Patient-Rated Inventory of Side Effects (PRISE)
outcomeMeasures.description: All side effects listed in Adverse Event section.
